interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus
Review Date: 2017/06/20
Store: Heath Ledger  (Actor),     Christopher Plummer  (Actor),     Terry Gilliam  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Enter a dazzling world of fantasy in The Imaginarium of Dr. Parnassus,Director Terry Gilliam’s magical adventure tale starring Heath Ledger in his last film role along with Christopher Plummer, Johnny Depp, Colin Farrell and Jude Law. In exchange for extraordinary powers, Dr. Parnassus (Plummer)makes a deal with the Devil to turn over any child of his when they turn sixteen. But as his daughter Valentina’s (Lily Cole) birthday approaches, a mysterious stranger(Ledger) arrives with the power to change everything. In this captivating, explosive and wonderfully imaginative race against time, Dr. Parnassus must fight to save his daughter in a never-ending landscape of surreal obstacles - and undo the mistakes of his past once and for all!', 'Amazon.com', "Terry Gilliam has long admired Marcel Carné's beautiful and tragic", 'Children of Paradise', '(he even contributes an introduction to the Criterion Collection edition). In', 'The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus', ', among his more phantasmagorical features, Gilliam conjures up his own unique theatrical troupe. Led by the immortal Parnassus (Christopher Plummer, whose daughter, Amanda, appeared in', 'The Fisher King', '), Anton (', 'Boy A', '\'s Andrew Garfield), Percy (Verne Troyer), and the doctor\'s doll-faced daughter, Valentina (model Lily Cole), travel through 21st-century London in their stagecoach set. Times are tight and the quartet is starting to unravel when they rescue Tony, a philanthropist (Heath Ledger, reuniting with Gilliam for the last time), from the Russian mob. Though Anton pines for Valentina, she falls for the new fellow, who charms female viewers into opening up their wallets. Little do the ladies realize they risk their souls when they pass through the Imaginarium, a Mylar mirror that leads to alternate realities (where Johnny Depp, Jude Law, and Colin Farrell play Tony\'s doppelgängers). As it transpires, Parnassus made a Faustian bargain with Mr. Nick (Tom Waits, whom Gilliam considers "America\'s greatest musical poet") centuries before and must supply Satan with five souls by Valentina\'s 16th birthday or Nick will take her away from him--permanently. One of the movie\'s more haunting lines, "Nothing is forever, not even death," could serve as an epitaph for Ledger, who died from an accidental overdose during filming, but lives again in the erratic, yet imaginative Gilliam\'s most purely enjoyable film since', 'Time Bandits', '.', '--Kathleen C. Fennessy', 'Stills from', 'The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus', '(Click for larger image)']
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Colin Farrell, Terry Gilliam, Christopher Plummer, Heath Ledger, Johnny Depp, Jude Law', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 3 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.56 x 5.43 x 7.32 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '34362', 'Director': 'Terry Gilliam', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '2 hours and 3 minutes', 'Release date': 'April 27, 2010', 'Actors': 'Heath Ledger, Christopher Plummer, Johnny Depp, Jude Law, Colin Farrell', 'Dubbed': 'Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Sony Pictures Classics', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: Weird movie but entertaining - hard to follow
Review Title: Four Stars
Rating: 4.0

reference_summary:
Grease 2
Michelle Pfeiffer  (Actor),     Maxwell Caulfield  (Actor),     Patricia Birch  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Musicals & Performing Arts, Musicals
['The sequel to the 1978 hit movie, GREASE 2 is set in the early 1960\x92s when a new British student, Michael Carrington (Caulfield), rides into town and joins the ranks at Rydell High. A book nerd who immediately falls for the blonde bombshell leader of the Pink Ladies, Stephanie Zinone (Pfeiffer), Michael finds himself smitten, but out of his element. Knowing that the Pink Ladies are the hippest clique of chicks at Rydell, who only date their equals in coolness - the T-Birds, Michael sets out to turn from a geek to a greaser to see if he can win the gorgeous Stephanie\x92s heart.']

I did not see the movie yet but my 9 yera old daughter stated, "it needs a little work!"  This is from a 9 yr old who loves the movie Greesand has watched it over 12 time, so I did not expect it to get good reviews!  lol
Review from my 9 yr old daughter

OMG!  What can I say! This movie is so good. Loved it and watched it over and over and over.
EXCELLENT!
The Brothers Grimm
Matt Damon  (Actor),     Heath Ledger  (Actor),     Terry Gilliam  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Miramax Home Entertainment, All Titles
["Matt Damon (THE BOURNE SUPREMACY, OCEAN'S TWELVE) and Heath Ledger (THE PATRIOT, A KNIGHT'S TALE) team up to bring you one of the year's most fantastic adventures in this magical tale based on the lives of the legendary storytellers. Will and Jake Grimm (Damon and Ledger) dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, but when the brothers journey into a real enchanted forest they encounter many of the fantastic characters and thrilling situations found in their beloved fairy tales! From the award-winning director of 12 MONKEYS, BRAZIL and MONTY PYTHON AND THE HOLY GRAIL, this fabulous motion picture is sure to leave you living happily ever after!"]

I enjoyed this movie - a little different! Enjoyable!
Five Stars

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

This user maintains a strong passion for family-friendly films and musicals that deliver enjoyable experiences for both themselves and their child. Recent interactions highlight a growing interest in imaginative narratives, particularly those that blend fantasy, adventure, and unique storytelling. Their latest review indicates a willingness to explore diverse cinematic offerings, even those that may be considered unconventional or "weird," as long as they provide entertainment value.

This pattern suggests the user appreciates films that challenge traditional narratives while still engaging younger audiences. Their positive engagement with a variety of genres reinforces a commitment to creating enriching family movie nights, emphasizing the importance of humor, adventure, and captivating characters. Their reviews reflect a playful tone and an openness to films that may spark curiosity and creativity, aiming to share memorable experiences with their family.

Furthermore, the user's choice of films suggests they value stories that offer deeper themes, even if they can be challenging to follow. This aligns with their intent to foster meaningful family activities that encourage discussion and imagination. Overall, the profile illustrates a dedicated parent who seeks high-quality, entertaining films that strengthen family connections and cater to multiple age groups, embracing both popular and quirky cinematic choices.
